评论详情: I purchased the Lightweight Workout Joggers for my daughter as part of her cheer uniform to wear when the team isn’t performing. These joggers have been a fantastic addition to her wardrobe! The fit was exactly as expected, ensuring comfort and ease of movement, which is crucial for an active cheerleader.  The joggers look tremendous and wear wonderfully, maintaining their quality even after multiple uses. The material is lightweight yet durable, offering breathability without compromising on sturdiness. My daughter loves how stylish they are. They seamlessly blend into her cheer attire while providing a practical option for non-performance times.  Overall, these joggers have exceeded our expectations in both function and style. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for comfortable, well-fitting workout pants suitable for various activities.

I'm a size XL, and the pants arrived true to size. I wore them out to a toddler play date, and they are easy to move around in and stretch. I can squat down, and my bottom doesn't fall out. There's an option to tie the waist tighter as well. I think the style is cute for every day errands, and casual settings. The material isn't too thick or too thin, and felt very comfortable under the kansas sun on a 75⁰ day. The material is pretty wrinkle resistant, as I've noticed they only show for a short period of time.

These are extremely similar to the high end style. I decided to give these a go before spending $100 dollars on the others and I’m glad I did! The fabric is nearly exactly the same. I haven’t washed them yet so cannot comment on how they hold up, but I have leggings from crz yoga that have lasted years. I am 5’6 ~ 145-150 and a true size medium. I purchased the medium and they fit nice but are a slim fit - so if you’re looking for oversized, size up! I purchased in black and they will make for a great casual pant. Will probably order in another color. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Love how comfortable it is and the wind breezes through
评论详情: Got the XS and it fits just right. Wanted to use it for a work out with lots of leg work but doesn’t seem to stretch much as it was a sung fit for me. My legs are pretty athletic with decent size calf. The S size was too baggy and too long but will keep it for lounging or a walk in the neighborhood.

I wanted to gatekeep these so they wouldn’t run out, but I LOVE these athletic joggers!!! I am a physical therapist and these are easy to move in, while still looking professional. I have a pair of real lulu joggers and these pants are slightly baggier, which I like better (& for a better price). I am 5’7” and 140 lbs and ordered a small (typically 4 or 6 in lulus). Will be getting these in every color!!
My teenage daughter loves these. She says they are very comparable to LULULEMON! The fit is perfect, loose and comfy like joggers should be. I got her a medium and she is normally an 8 in LULULEMON.

I would say a size 14 is more like a 12 in these.  The navy color is pretty and it seems like they would be really comfortable to wear.  Maybe I’ll lose some weight working out and they will fit. . LOL!

I love love love these joggers. They are so comfy they have a very good material and are just thick enough to keep you warm! They look like a perfect dupe to high end brands and are very flattering! The waist band is very stretchy! I sized down to  a xs to make them not as baggy because I like my clothes and tighter, I’m 5’0 100 lbs and struggle with finding pants that are the right length and theese were perf

评论概述: Lulu dance studio dupe, they’re so good🍑
评论详情: I have 6 pair of the lulu dance studio joggers (there my favorite) and I can honestly say these are the exact same thing, right done to the drawstrings. These are a quarter of the price. I wish I would have found these joggers sooner, I could have saved me a lot of money. I will be ordering two more pairs of these joggers. I already purchased the gray ones. I’m going to order the black and khaki one too.

I bought my daughter a pair of the name brand joggers for Christmas, and I tried them on. I loved the way they fit but couldn’t spend that on myself…I bought these to try and OH MY GOSH…side by side comparison, you seriously can’t tell…the fabric of this is a little heavier, and the pocket is different but that is it. They fit the same and are so flattering and cute. Will most def buy more!!!
I love these so much but they aren’t quite as breathable as the lululemon ones and these also aren’t as flexible especially if you’re a dancer.
These pants are the best. The black have a slight striping to them, but they fit like a glove. Made of good quality and very easy to move in. Not thick material. I am 5’5”, 153 lbs and got a Medium.

These are go to dupes for the high end joggers in my house. My teen dancer loves these and has them in multiple colors. Love that they come in XXS. These are a perfect dupe for a fraction of the price and fit her better than the original. Wash normally hang to dry. She wears them weekly.
Perfect for every day wear. The best dupe I’ve found. I had to buy more!
These are so comfy and so cute! All the colors are just like the photos
I got so many compliments on these! Also look exactly like lulu
Seemed really nice just didn’t like the fit personally hugged my thighs too much
I love these, so comfortable, stretch well in all the right places, and great dupe for the other brand we all know!

The ONLY joggers I have ever liked are the lululemon dance studio joggers, but after my last pair wore out, I couldn’t justify spending that amount on joggers again. I tried these and LOVE them! Lightweight and comfortable without being baggy or frumpy looking. I’m normally a 12-14 in jeans and the XL fits nicely as someone who doesn’t prefer joggers to be skin tight. Definitely recommend!
These fit well and look a lot like Lulu!
Exactly what I was looking for!

These are so great. Perfect dupe for the Lulu dance joggers. They aren’t exactly made for tall people. I’m 6’0 and they are a little short so I sized up to gain some length. Overall great tho and I want to order more the high waist is perfect

评论用户: Prefers to Remain Anonymous Verified Buyer
评论详情: Very comfortable, lulu dupe for much cheaper. So far they wash well

Love these, am a total convert and bought two more pairs after getting the first one. The pockets are deep enough for my Pixel 8 to fit easily while walking - I wear a 4/6 in women's sizes and got a medium. The waistband is a bit loose (but with the drawstring cinched it's fine - I wouldn't go down to a small because the fit around my quads is perfect. I suspect if I went down a size it'd be too tight.
I have the Lulu version of these pants and I cannot tell the difference they are identical. They also wash well, more thin breathable fabric, very comfortable.
I lived in these joggers all summer. Traveled in them as well. Highly recommend.
Comfortable, Size M, I’m 5’4”, 155 lbs, hips 39”; waist 36”, Perfect fit, length just at ankle. ❤️❤️❤️

评论概述: Amazing joggers, better than the other brand
评论详情: I absolutely love these joggers. They look exactly the same as lulu but are HIGH waisted so they fit me correctly and do not give me camel toe. I haven’t washed them or worn them yet so cannot speak to how well they will hold up. But I’d imagine they’d last at least through one winter of wearing every week. They seem to be made very well. For the price you can’t beat it. The only down side is the fabric isn’t as nice as lulu which makes sense. But we are taking very minor differences. You need to buy these. The medium fits like a size 8.
10/10 best purchase i made and amazing dupe to the lulu ones!
I love these pants. They fit great, perfect length.
Great quality for the price, my daughter loves them.

This pant is almost identical to my expensive lululemon dance pants! Even material is similar.  Fit is good. Runs a little big.  I bought a second pair in another color as soon as I I tried these on.  Good deal!
These are great quality and look perfect on. Also sizing was accurate

评论概述: super nice but…..not a lulu dupe, sorry.
评论详情: i loved the fit of these, better than the lulu dance studios, bc i love the high waist. good quality, and the color Melanite is absolutely stunning. However,…i returned them. I just couldn’t figure out where I would actually wear these! The material is like 80’s windbreaker material. I cannot imagine working out in them, they would get so wet inside and show sweat it seems like? and they are too sporty for like going to work. Too cold for fall or winter, too hot for summer..::maybe spring? idk. I just couldn’t figure it out! Not hiking, they wouldn’t be durable climbing up a mountain or walking through the woods. So i took a star off. Someone please tell me where people wear these type of pants! editing my review to post that i do now in fact own the lululemon version and the fabric is drastically different. The lululemon ones are way softer and don’t really swish like these do. i really wish they had worked out bc the fit is better on these ones than theirs on my body. but i have sensory issues and i think the fabric on these would make me super unhappy all day.
I like the pants . They are well made and fit well. I may buy in more colors.

评论概述: If you’re looking for a Lulu dupe, this is it!!
评论详情: I’m 5’9 140lbs and I ordered a small! They fit perfect!! I will 100% be buying more. The fit and style is almost the exact same as the dance studio joggers from Lululemon.
I wanted to love these but so high waisted that it was uncomfortable.

I have bigger thighs and a bigger butt but a small waist and even with the strings tightened all the way the waist was to big. They fit on my thighs well but were kinda saggy in the butt. Maybe I should try a smaller size but either way I returned them.

These joggers are loose where I want them to be, in the hips and thighs, but fitted enough at my waist (with the drawstring tied) and ankles to look put together. Currently a PE teacher and I have several colors and enough to rotate through the week and then some. I wear a medium - I have to cinch the waist a bit, but I don’t mind. I am a size 4/6.

I have a lot of CRZ clothes (like prob $1000’s worth at this point), so I’m a big fan of their products. I feel like these run small compared to other joggers, and their sizing overall seems to have gotten smaller over the years. I’ve been weight training got years and needed to replace some favorite items with a larger size. I got these in large and they fit like mediums so I had to return for an XL.  This is upsetting because XL is the largest size they carry and I’m not a “fat” person, just muscular with a large back and broad shoulders and hips.  I recommend you buy these based on the size guide not what you wear in other brands. I have a 33” waist and 45” hips and usually wear a large/12/32 in bottoms.  These I would wear casually, for running, or upper body days. I would’ve recommend for leg day or yoga (anything with a lot of leg mobility work) because they’re not that lose or stretchy in the thigh area.  I bought in lilac with the matching lilac bra top and am obsessed. Will definitely buy more
I love the fit and I find it very comfortable . Material is soft but on the wrinkled look side .

I love these pants!!  was so impressed by these! I have the name brand studio jogger and side by side these are nearly indistinguishable! I'm a 4 in name brand, I got a small. They fit slightly bigger than my 4's but not enough to make a huge difference. Maybe a half an inch in the waistband and slightly bigger in the tush. But they still fit and look amazing. 100% worth it!!!

I am 37 years old, 5'7 and weigh 150#. I wear size 4 or 6... and am usually exactly in between those sizes. I wear a 4 in lulu studio pants (the first version). These pants fit good in sizes S and M... the only reason I gave 4 stars is bc I have 2 pair of Smalls (same color) and they fit slightly different from one another. One fits PERFECTLY and the other fits just a tad tight.  If you lean more towards a 2-4... go with a Small. They are more fitted than I prefer when I first put them on, but they stretch out to perfection after my drive in to work. I wear these every day to work as a physical therapist assistant and they are very professional, while allowing me to move around freely. I wish they had an open-leg version of these. I would love some variety.

This pants is perfect replacement for lululemon, I also tried other pants, the xxs size is perfect for petite I have been found in US. I am 5’2, 100lb. But the knees like the second pic after sitting for sometime, which is I don’t like and giving 4 star. Other than that, everything is perfect, I love it.

This is not a Lulu dupe in my opinion.  The seams inside the pants are rough and when you walk they make a swishing sound which my Lulus (Studio dance pants) do NOT make.  I will say that I like the fit of these, they looked good on me but I couldn't get past the rough seams and swishing sound when moving around.
These are a great dupe of a high end brand at a fraction of the price! In fact, my teens think these are a better fit!

评论概述: 155 lbs, 5ft 7in, Size Large SO COMFY! Don’t hesitate! Hot weather must have.
评论详情: Recommended size was Medium, but I knew from past purchases of this brand, I needed a Large. If you like a form fitting, tight fit, follow the chart. If you prefer a looser more comfy fit, size up from what it recommends. I’m 155lbs, 5ft 7in tall. Size 8/10 in jeans. Medium in tops. 36” bust. I love these pants. Where I work, I cannot wear shorts and there’s no A/C so I needed something lightweight and these work perfectly! Very breathable. I bought several colors. Don’t hesitate. You’ll like them.
The item came as described and fit my daughter perfectly.
Great “dance pant” dupe at 1/3 the price!
I would recommend to size down if in between sizes. I’m usually size 6 and the medium is a bit too big

I had several pairs of lululemon dance studio joggers but lost weight and had to replace them. I am an 8 and the medium are perfect! They even have the same pockets to keep your card or identification secure.

Needed some joggers for work and just classic pair of joggers to run errands in. LOVE these! Being 5’9 it’s hard to find a high waisted jogger where it also doesn’t ride up on my ankles. These are perfect. Very comfortable. Deep pockets. Light fabric. Enough stretch to make them even perfect for a workout.

评论概述: Exact Dupes for Lululemon Dance studio joggers
评论详情: Love these joggers. They are almost an exact replica of the Lululemon joggers that cost almost $100. The fit, feel and material is identical. Great material quality and have some stretch, very light weight. Will Purchase more

评论概述: Exactly like the Lululemon Dance Studio Joggers
评论详情: I have daughters that have the Lululemon pants like this, and like any good mom I ordered myself the cheaper knock off version. These pants are IDENTICAL to the Lululemon brand. The quality is just as good! I would highly recommend them!
This fabric comes out of the dryer ok, but as soon as you fold the pants, they are a wrinkly mess again!  I bought a large as recommended, but the pants are large on me.  I would not buy them again.

Literally the best joggers I’ve ever worn. So comfortable and long enough for my long legs. True to size and a little roomy. If you want a tighter fit size down one. So comfy and I love all the color options.
Love these yoga pants I’m wearing them now. Very comfortable with a slight stretch. Nice pockets. No shrinkage after washing. True to size and color. I’m 5’8” 152lbs and wear a large in these pants.

评论概述: Exactly what I wanted it to be
评论详情: I’m 5’4, 165lbs, usually a size 6-8 in pants and I bought the Large. It fits exactly like the model picture in terms of tightness and rusching and seems to be a spot on dupe. It’s definitely not loose on me and if I sized down to a medium (what I normally get), it would’ve been too tight and alter the style of the pants. It’s exactly what I expected it to look, feel, and fit like, if that makes sense?

These are very comfortable and if you have long legs- they actually hit at the ankles! But the sizing is weird. I got a large new use I wanted them loose, but these have the same size waist as my medium pants. nothing to make me ever buy these again, but odd that they’re a large and the same size as medium.
They are great exactly like the Lululemon dance joggers. I did find them a touch longer but that's the only difference.

评论概述: These are really comfortable and look great.
评论详情: I was worried that these wouldn’t look good or be flattering on my figure. But, they look super cute. I really like the navy color. Excited to wear these on my trip to Switzerland.

评论概述: Almost exactly like lululemon for a fraction of the price.
评论详情: Very comfortable. Material is not as soft as Lulu's but almost. Pants are very comfortable, they are a replica of the expensive ones. I originally bought XS judging from reviews but they were too small. I returned for S and they fit perfect. For ref I am 5'2 approx 110lbs. If you like Lululemon these are almost identical and are not cheap looking.
The way they fit. My granddaughter’s pant. Ordered extra small. The fit was fantastic. Slim fitting yet comfortable in the places they needed to be.  Light weight for summer and fall
Bought size medium, fit perfect.  5'4. 143#. Nice quality.  Look just like the Lulu dance studio.  Already bought another color.
Can I give these 100 stars? I am a lululemon addict and let me tell you, these pants are perfection. They fit perfectly and maybe even better! They are worth the price and no label.
The pants are extremely comfortable and lightweight. Perfect for the summer to fall transition. I plan to purchase another pair.

These are JUST like, if not BETTER than the Lululemon dance studio mid rise joggers. These ones actually fit my legs and are more comfortable. I got a size small and I am 5’8, 145lbs with a bit bigger hips and behind (40” hip). material is super nice and doesn’t feel cheap at all. I am super self-conscious of the fit of pants and picky, but these are so flattering. Will 100% be buying more colors!

I bought these for indoor therapy I do with my clients. I wanted something comfy but looked more professional than leggings. They are comfortable and I love the deep pockets. The waist banks is thick and supportive. I didn’t realize they have little lines on them and aren’t a solid color. I don’t I’d since I got black. I am 5’7 and 196lbs and ordered a L.

Stumbled upon these while I had the LL version in my cart on their site. Looked identical so I took a shot and ordered these instead. So happy! They look identical for less than half the price. Wore them running errands today and they are perfect. (Ordered a small, I’m 5’6” 145lbs).

These are very similar to lululemon at a fraction of the cost. The only complaint I have is the color was not the same as pictured. I thought it would be a hot pink, but it is really magenta (a little more on the purple side). Still cute!
Material is really good, looks just like the Lululemon pants but for cheaper price.
I’ve been looking for good work joggers and These were just what I was looking for! Cute fit and colors.

DONT HESITATE. I have the Sonic pink pair from LL and these are 9/10 the same exact pant. I actually don’t notice anything different since I feel like they’re just as soft. The Juniper color is the same as “medium forest (LL)”, the magenta purple is the same as “magenta purple(LL”, I will say I got the brown pair and it does NOT match either tones of the LL. I also have the navy pair as well, not the French navy, I believe the “ink blue” and it’s super close to the Navy LL pair. I’m 5’10, 135lb, these hit right above my ankle, I wear a size 4/6 in LL and the small dupe fits like a size 6. Also, if you look on their storefront, you can find matching tops which are the SAME color as the pants.

I absolutely LOVE this pants! I’m shocked honestly, I didn’t expect them to be this kind of quality, I will have to buy more colors and styles of THIS brand…love them!! Btw I purchased the cream color, there is a bit of ‘see through’ so I just put on nude color underwear. Not a problem at all, I actually love the material, it’s light and stretchy…  Please make more colors…I want some white ones too!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
I never write reviews but I had to for this one. So comfortable. I like how it fits and feels.
I liked these but they run 1 size big and stretch out after wearing them. I haven't decided if I will order again.

I buy a lot of clothes from Athleta and Lululemon and these joggers were comparable and at a fraction the price. I love these light weight joggers because they fit just right, look great and have nice deep pockets!
These are great pants!  My daughter is so jealous,

评论概述: Seems to be just like the Lulus
评论详情: Buy them! Love

I am a LL devotee, and never seek out dupes because if you are used to their quality and softness of the materials, nothing else will satisfy you. However, I needed a few new pairs of hiking pants and really did not want to drop $100/pair on pants I will wear only a few times a year.  These turned out to be an amazing dupe for the Dance Studio MR Full Length Jogger. They look the same - minus the lack of LL logo of course. The material is almost as soft, not quite as nice, but for 1/3 of the price and, again, something I'll wear rarely, these are perfect. The Juniper color is spot on for LL's Medium Forest.  I wear a 10 in Dance Studios and the large in these fits me great. Maybe even a little better.
Wearing a size L

评论概述: Dupe for lululemon dance studio joggers
评论详情: I just bought a pair of lululemon dance studio joggers and compared these side by side. I'd say the quality of the material isn't the exact same, but it's close enough for the price! My only wish is that they offered these in different lengths because even though they're joggers, I have short legs and they bunch up at the bottom. I would love to have ones that fit me lengthwise a little better. Overall, if you're looking for something similar and less expensive, these are the way to go!

评论概述: runs small,not the same as other crz pants
评论详情: i have 3 other crz yoga joggers and they are all a size large and fit great even a little loose but these came and they are too tight not sized the same as other crz produicts. hassle to send back and order again. great fabric and made well just dissapointed in the size difference from other things ive ordered

评论概述: Love the fit but the seams stink
评论详情: These pants are really comfy. The waist is truly high wasited and they are long enough (tall girl friendly). The material feels really nice but there are seams that run down the legs that are kinda irritating. They are soft so they dont rub and you eventually ignore them...but I would prefer them not being there. Overall definitly still worth the price in my mind.

They are pretty good. I’m sort of short and squat so there is a little extra fabric at the bottom, unlike the model, so they don’t look as sleek (usually the case). Also would recommend washing these on cold and air drying - some of the fabric has gotten weird and maybe that’s from heat?
Great joggers! So comfy

5'4", 120 lbs XS was perfect fit, and length is right to ankle with no bunching. Great for long distance plane ride, also for hiking. Not so fast drying because the knit waistband is heavier than the lighter nylon fabric. The front seam is a bit more ruched that I realized, so it's not a smooth look, but it's ok. Super comfortable.
These are almost identical to the Lulul***n pants, the fabric is just slightly off. The fabric is a little more "swishy" if that makes sense. But the fit is great, and for the price...a  no brainer.

评论概述: Size up for relaxed fit—good lululemon dupe
评论详情: I am 5’8” and a solid size 8-10.  I don’t like things that are too tight in the crotch, but I also don’t like the baggy look. The large was just right for my body.  The fabric is not quite as soft as I imagined, and the ruching was a bit less evident in person than in pictures, but that being said, this is a solid Lululemon dupe of their studio jogger style.

These fit a little more snug than other CRZ pants. I’m normally a medium and I ordered these in a large. Fit perfect. 5’9” 150 for reference. Also I saw in other reviews that these were short “like capris” on tall folks but they fall right at the top of my ankle.
Absolutely love the fit, flattering and also good for work scrub pants

评论概述: Fit perfectly, I am ordering more
评论详情: I am 5’4”, 135lbs,  with a 28 waist, 38 hips , and the small fit perfectly. I washed and dried these and I didn’t notice any shrinkage.  I wore these pants for a full day of shopping and I did not have to tug these up once; the waist band stayed in place all day. The waist band did not roll over.  The pants did not stretch out and lose its shape either. I was so comfortable all day.  I have found the unicorn of pants!
I’m almost 5’7” 138lbs size small fits perfect and length is 28.5 is perfect. Not short at all.  The other ones that are 27.5 is tooo short

I have a brand of $80 pants that I've been loyal to for years but felt like mixing it up and trying something new!  The good: fabric, fit, comfort, style The bad: on me (5'8 with long legs) these look kind of dorky, like floods! The models must be short! Also, no zipper pocket which is a drawback when traveling.

评论概述: I’m to tall for these pants 😭
评论详情: I liked the pant I am 6’ tho and they are not long enough sadly.
Wore these on repeat this spring to all my kids, athletic events, outdoors on walks. running errands, working from home, etc.
I like the color and fit of these joggers. They are comfortable and seem to be light enough that I will be using them when I hit the course this spring and early summer months.
It wasn’t the airy fabric that I thought it was. It felt thicker and less breathable that what I thought.

Just got these in the mail. Fit perfectly. Sizing wise. True to size. I’m 5’4 and 145/150 weight range and small and longer length option is perfect!  However, the packaging was ripped open and they smell like chemical/strong laundry detergent. Suspect they may be a return so will return these and order again in hopes of a fresh pair.  Update - Reorder arrived in perfect condition. Love them! May order another pair in black in XS. They stretch just a little after wearing. Highly recommend. Great lululemon dupe!
I never write reviews, these pants are this good. I do wish I got a small, I am 5’5” and about 138lbs. Medium will be good with I have my winter coat back on. Buy then.
